title: Fibrations and coset spaces for locally compact groups
authors: Linus Kramer and Raquel Murat Garc\'ia
abstract:
Let $G$ be a topological group and let $K,L\subseteq G$ be closed subgroups,
with $K\subseteq L$.
  We prove that if $L$ is a locally compact pro-Lie group, then the map
$q:G/K\to G/L$ is a fibration. As an application of this, we obtain two older
results by Skljarenko, Madison and Mostert.
